FieldEnable.Name: Save the parameters
FieldEnable.Expect: The parameters should be saved successfully

FieldEnable.Name: Enable the system setup
FieldEnable.Expect: The system setup should be enabled

FieldEnable.Name: Disable the system setup
FieldEnable.Expect: The system setup should be disabled

FieldMotion.Name: Enable the setup by each axis
FieldMotion.Expect: Each axis should be in Enable state

FieldMotion.Name: Perform motion of the setup
FieldMotion.Expect: Each axis should movement according to configuration

FieldMotion.Name: Disable the system setup
FieldMotion.Expect: The system setup should be disabled
